greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Minimal m>=0 such that (2*n-1)!! + 2^m is prime.
maple: for m from 0 while not isprime(doublefactorial(2*n-1)+2^m)
mathematica: a[n_] := Block[{f = (2*n - 1)!!, m = 0}, While[! PrimeQ[f + 2^m], m++]; m]; a/@Range[70] (* _Giovanni Resta_, Feb 15 2013 *)
results.author: _Vladimir Shevelev_, Feb 14 2013
